sentences.en: "I wish I did," said Phil Jordan, relapsing into his usual gloom.
sentences.cn: “我要是那样做了就好了，”菲尔·乔丹说道，又像往常一样消沉起来。

sentences.en: Blow out the candles and make a wish.
sentences.cn: 吹蜡烛许愿吧。

sentences.en: Close your eyes and make a wish.
sentences.cn: 闭上眼睛许个愿。

sentences.en: Goodbye, Hanu. I wish you well.
sentences.cn: 再见，哈努，祝你顺心如意。

sentences.en: He had no wish to uproot Dena from her present home.
sentences.cn: 他没想过让德娜离开现在的家去别处居住。

sentences.en: He wished Emily were with him.
sentences.cn: 他真希望埃米莉陪着他。

sentences.en: I just wanted to wish you a merry Christmas.
sentences.cn: 我只想祝福你圣诞快乐。

sentences.en: I wish I'd discovered photography when I was younger.
sentences.cn: 我要是早点接触到摄影技术就好了。

sentences.en: I wish it weren't true.
sentences.cn: 但愿这不是真的。

sentences.en: I wish that I could afford a new car.
sentences.cn: 我要是有钱买辆新车就好了。

sentences.en: I wish to enlarge upon a statement made by Gary Docking.
sentences.cn: 我想就加里·多金的话再展开说一下。

sentences.en: If you wish to discuss this matter further please do not hesitate to contact me.
sentences.cn: 如果你想进一步讨论此事，请尽管和我联系。

sentences.en: If you wish, you may now have a glass of milk.
sentences.cn: 你想喝的话，现在可以喝一杯牛奶。

sentences.en: She was sincere and genuine in her wish to make amends for the past.
sentences.cn: 她诚恳而真心地希望弥补过去的错误。

sentences.en: Sometimes I wish I had never been born.
sentences.cn: 有时候我倒希望自己没有生出来。

sentences.en: The cook will prepare whatever you wish.
sentences.cn: 你想吃什么厨师就会给你做什么。

sentences.en: The Matron at the nursing home expressed a wish to attend.
sentences.cn: 养老院的护士长说她愿意参加。

sentences.en: The world is not always what we wish it to be.
sentences.cn: 世界并不总是如我们所愿。

sentences.en: They have no wish for any change in the status quo.
sentences.cn: 他们不想改变现状。

sentences.en: Wish him all the best, and tell him we miss him.
sentences.cn: 祝他一切顺利，告诉他我们想念他。

sentences.en: You have the right to withhold your custom if you so wish.
sentences.cn: 如果你这么不想来，你可以不再光顾。

sentences.en: You may leave now, if you wish.
sentences.cn: 如果你想走，现在就可以走了。

sentences.en: You may wish to take advantage of our instructional session.
sentences.cn: 你应该充分利用我们的教学课程。

words.tran_cn: 渴望的，愿望的；寄予希望的
渴望地；希望地；不满足地

phrases.tran_cn: n. [心]死亡愿望（有意无意的对己或对人的）

phrases.phrase: if wishes were horses, beggars would ride
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)如果愿望是匹马，乞丐也能有马骑；如果你能仅仅通过愿望来实现目标，生活将非常容易

phrases.phrase: the wish is father to the thought
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)愿望是思想之父；希望什么就相信什么
希望离开；不停地表示愿望

trans.tran_en: a desire to do something, to have something, or to have something happen
if you wish to do something or you wish to have it done for you, you want to do it or want to have it done

trans.tran_cn: 想要，希望，盼望，祈求，祝愿
trans.tran_en: to want something to be true although you know it is either impossible or unlikely
